description: Try our easy to follow Chestnut Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chestnut Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red apple, cored and cut into matchsticks
200g brussel sprouts, trimmed, outer leaves removed, halved lengthways

recipeInstructions.text: Score around the chestnut shells using the tip of a sharp knife. Place chestnuts around microwave plate in a single layer. Microwave on high for 2 minutes or until shells split. Cool slightly then remove shell and inner brown skin from nuts. Roughly chop.
Heat oil and butter in a deep frying pan over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, sprouts and chestnuts, and cook for about 3 minutes until golden.
Combine with cabbage and transfer to a serving platter. Top with apple.
Whisk oil, vinegar, mustard and honey together in a jug. Drizzle over salad and serve immediately.
